message.content: {"id": "2120", "title": "Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)", "description": "The bug report does not provide any specific description of the issue.", "OB": "The files selected by the user should appear in the File menu MRU (Most Recently Used) list.", "EB": "Currently, the files selected by the user do not appear in the File menu MRU list. This list should persist between sessions.", "SR": "Implement the use of IPersistableElement to ensure that the MRU File List is persisted between sessions. Do not rely on the underlying resource, as the IEditorInput may not always be a resource."}
